title: Luxury waterfront hotel in Puerto Madero
description: Experience luxury in the heart of Buenos Aires' most exclusive neighborhood. Hotel Madero offers stunning river views, world-class dining, and easy access to the city's top attractions.

title: Historic palace turned luxury hotel
description: Stay in a beautifully restored 1930s palace in the elegant Recoleta neighborhood. Palacio Duhau combines historic charm with modern luxury amenities.

title: Artistic luxury in Puerto Madero
description: A masterpiece of design and luxury, Faena Hotel Buenos Aires offers an artistic retreat with stunning architecture, fine dining, and world-class service.

title: Iconic luxury in the heart of Recoleta
description: The legendary Alvear Palace Hotel offers timeless elegance and impeccable service in one of Buenos Aires' most prestigious addresses.
